This extension features a new tab homepage with a range of wonderful space themes backgrounds to choose and also it is a hub for your browsing through features such as an integrated Bing search bar.

Important Information and links:

Data Collection: Our service may collect Personal, Usage, and Search Data, which are anonymously stored to enhance your experience and improve our services. Read our comprehensive Privacy Policy for more information.
